snippet: Allegra Charlotte Ford, the daughter of Anne Ford of New York and the late Giancarlo Uzielli, weds Joshua Thomas, with whom she owns a fitness center in Massachusetts.
lead_paragraph: Allegra Charlotte Ford, the daughter of Anne Ford of New York and the late Giancarlo Uzielli, was married Saturday to Joshua Thomas, the son of Linda Murphy and John L. Murphy of Scituate, Mass. The Rev. Peter M. Colapietro, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at the Church of St. Vincent Ferrer in New York. The bride, 40, and the bridegroom, 39, own Anytime Fitness, a fitness center in Melrose, Mass.
